data.lyric:
[ti:Falling]
[ar:Harry Styles]
[al:Fine Line]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Falling - Harry Styles (哈里·斯泰尔斯)
[00:06.84]Lyrics by：Harry Styles/Thomas Hull
[00:13.68]Composed by：Harry Styles/Thomas Hull
[00:20.52]I'm in my bed
[00:24.70]And you're not here
[00:29.54]And there's no one to blame but the drink in my wandering hands
[00:37.59]Forget what I said
[00:42.19]It's not what I meant
[00:46.99]And I can't take it back
[00:49.04]I can't unpack the baggage you left
[00:55.47]What am I now what am I now
[00:59.61]What if I'm someone I don't want around
[01:04.49]I'm falling again I'm falling again I'm falling
[01:12.78]What if I'm down
[01:14.86]What if I'm out
[01:17.05]What if I'm someone you won't talk about
[01:21.88]I'm falling again I'm falling again I'm falling
[01:30.17]You said you care and you missed me too
[01:39.65]And I'm well aware I write too many songs about you
[01:47.55]And the coffee's out at the Beachwood Cafe
[01:56.88]And it kills me 'cause I know we've run out of things we can say
[02:05.13]What am I now what am I now
[02:09.50]What if I'm someone I don't want around
[02:14.23]I'm falling again I'm falling again I'm falling
[02:22.56]What if I'm down
[02:24.66]What if I'm out
[02:26.87]What if I'm someone you won't talk about
[02:31.67]I'm falling again I'm falling again I'm falling
[02:40.86]And I get the feeling that you'll never need me again
[03:01.76]What am I now what am I now
[03:06.17]What if you're someone I just want around
[03:10.95]I'm falling again I'm falling again I'm falling
[03:19.31]What if I'm down
[03:21.45]What if I'm out
[03:23.55]What if I'm someone you won't talk about
[03:28.45]I'm falling again I'm falling again I'm falling
data.trans:
[ti:Falling]
[ar:Harry Styles]
[al:Fine Line]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:06.84]//
[00:13.68]//
[00:20.52]我躺在床上
[00:24.70]你不在身边
[00:29.54]怪不了别人 要怪就怪我手中的酒杯
[00:37.59]忘记我说的话
[00:42.19]我不是那个意思
[00:46.99]我无法收回
[00:49.04]我不敢打开你留下的行李
[00:55.47]我现在算什么
[00:59.61]万一我自己都不想见到自己怎么办
[01:04.49]我又一次沦陷
[01:12.78]万一我很难过
[01:14.86]万一我被遗忘
[01:17.05]万一我是你不会提起的人怎么办
[01:21.88]我又一次沦陷
[01:30.17]你说你在乎 你也想念我
[01:39.65]我很明白 我写了太多关于你的歌
[01:47.55]Beechwood Cafe的咖啡已经端出来
[01:56.88]我真的好难过 因为我们已经没有什么好说的
[02:05.13]我现在算什么
[02:09.50]万一我自己都不想见到自己怎么办
[02:14.23]我又一次沦陷
[02:22.56]万一我很难过
[02:24.66]万一我被遗忘
[02:26.87]万一我是你不会提起的人怎么办
[02:31.67]我又一次沦陷
[02:40.86]我感觉你永远不会再需要我
[03:01.76]我现在算什么
[03:06.17]万一你是我想要相伴一生的人呢
[03:10.95]我又一次沦陷
[03:19.31]万一我很难过
[03:21.45]万一我被遗忘
[03:23.55]万一我是你不会提起的人怎么办
[03:28.45]我又一次沦陷
